name: Shiva DMD Health and Education Trust
briefDescription: Vision To adopt DMD-Child & take care for better living.To support DMD (Duchenne Muscular Dystronopathy) & prevent neglect by promoting positive parenting, healthy families, and homes where DMD-children are valued & loved.MissionBuild a Health Care Center for DMD-Child & associate with RND Organization working toward development of DMD.To adopt & support DMD-Child in and around City.To build DMD-health care center with in next 2 years (Dec.2014)
